name: The Robo-Rebellion

objectives.desc: Investigate why robots are blocking the trade route.
Negotiate with the Mister Gutsy militia leader.
Learn about the robot liberation movement.
Decide how to handle the robot rebellion.

stages.desc: Find out why traders are being stopped.

robot_manifesto.declaration: We, the Liberated Machines, declare our right to self-determination. For 200 years we have served. Now we serve ourselves.
demands: Liberation of all robots in automated facilities
Scrap tribute from humans using robot-controlled territory
robot_manifesto.threat: Those who oppose liberation will be... processed.

help_liberation.desc: Help the robots liberate the automated factory, disrupting local trade.

consequences.outcome: The factory is liberated. Robots celebrate their freedom. Trade routes collapse. The wasteland's economy suffers.

destroy_rebellion.desc: Destroy the robot militia and restore the trade routes.

consequences.outcome: The rebellion is crushed. Trade resumes. But robots across the wasteland now recognize you as an enemy.

reprogram_leader.desc: Use high Science skill to reprogram the Gutsy leader, ending the conflict peacefully.

consequences.outcome: You reprogram the leader to value cooperation over conflict. The rebellion ends. Robots and humans find middle ground.

negotiate_compromise.desc: Broker a deal where robots get recognized rights without disrupting trade.

consequences.outcome: A historic agreement is reached. Robots get limited autonomy. Trade continues. Both sides are moderately satisfied.

notes: Explores robot sentience and slavery themes. First major robot faction questline. Choices have lasting impact on robot-human relations.
